name: zipcode_by_city
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geosource_api.
Tool description: Introducing GeoSource API - the comprehensive API service that provides a wealth of geo-information on countries, states, cities, zip codes, currencies, flags, and much more. With GeoSource API, developers can easily access accurate and up-to-date geo-information to enhance their applications and services.

API description: Retrives the zip code/codes of the city ( must be in the supported countries list [ 44 countries ]).

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve zip code(s). The city must be in the supported countries list (44 countries).
